# bookish-octo-fiesta
![alt text](https://openclipart.org/image/2400px/svg_to_png/204593/octo1.png "Octo fiesting")

Picks 8 books from your Goodreads followers and adds it to your shelf. 

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/848061ad5ed4b1dc3a1d#?env%5BWhat%20should%20I%20read%3F%)

### Setup:

1. To generate your OAuth Access Tokens, run this docker image using the command below. 
`docker run aliasgarmurtaza/bookish-octa-fiesta`

2. Open the url in the browser to authorize goodreads access. 

3. Replace the generated OAuth Token and Secret to config.json.

4. Click on `Run in Postman` button. Don't forget to select the config.json file as data file.

5. Enjoy your personalized reading list! :)
